explains: n. （性质）正式，正式性；遵守礼节；例行公事；礼节，正式手续

sentences.en: She greeted him with stiff formality.
sentences.cn: 她拘谨地按礼节向他致意。

sentences.en: Different levels of formality are appropriate in different situations.
sentences.cn: 不同程度的注重礼节适用于不同场合。

sentences.en: He has the greatest disregard for all formality.
